name: Gates of Hel
description:
Now you are a reaper, and your main function is to feed the Hel's dogs

How to play:

  • Use the keyboard arrows to move the reaper
  • To attack the villagers, walk to their direction to reap!
  • You can only carry one soul 
  • To feed the dogs walk in their direction!
  • Be careful from the soldiers, they are invencible and they can shoot
  • The bats are so annoying, they are always trying to make your daily job more difficult
